thread.title: Trump welcomes prisoners released by North Korea

title: Trump welcomes prisoners released by North Korea
text:
Trump welcomes prisoners released by North Korea 12:08pm BST - 02:03
U.S. President Donald Trump welcomes three former U.S. prisoners who landed at a military base near Washington on Thursday after being released by North Korea, thanking leader Kim Jong Un and sounding upbeat on a planned summit between the two. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
